00032 #include <pthread.h>
00033 #include "ctk_env.h"

00035 /* for libspe2-2.0.0 work around */
00036 #if defined(SPE_RUN_USER_REGS) && !defined(SPE_TAG_ALL)
00037 # define LIBSPE2_VERSION   200
00038 #elif defined(SPE_CALLBACK_NEW)
00039 # define LIBSPE2_VERSION   202
00040 #else
00041 # define LIBSPE2_VERSION   201
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 /* the internal flag indicating if we can access problem state registers */
00045 extern bool can_access_ps_flag;
00046 
00047 typedef struct ctk_spe_context_body {
00048     /* common part */
00049     unsigned int m_type;
00050     unsigned int m_counter;
00051     unsigned int m_status;
00052     ctk_env_t *m_env;
00053     pthread_mutex_t m_status_lock;
00054     bool m_stopped;
00055 
00056     /* private part */
00057     spe_context_ptr_t m_context;
00058     spe_program_handle_t *m_handle;
00059 #if (LIBSPE2_VERSION == 200)
00060     pthread_mutex_t m_context_lock;
00061 #endif /* LIBSPE2_VERSION == 200 */
00062 } ctk_spe_context_body_t;
00063 
00064 #define _CTK_SPE_NATIVE(spe)      ((spe)->m_context)
00065 
00066 typedef spe_program_handle_t _ctk_spe_program_t;
00067 typedef ctk_spe_context_body_t  *_ctk_spe_context_t;

00074 enum fd_name { FD_MBOX, FD_MBOX_STAT, FD_IBOX, FD_IBOX_STAT, FD_WBOX, FD_WBOX_STAT, FD_SIG1, FD_SIG2, FD_MFC, FD_MSS, NUM_MBOX_FDS };

00076 #define PSMAP_SIZE                      0x20000   /* 128K (in bytes) */
00077 #define MFC_SIZE                        0x1000
00078 #define MSS_SIZE                        0x1000
00079 #define CNTL_SIZE                       0x1000
00080 #define SIGNAL_SIZE                     0x1000

00082 struct spe_context_base_priv {
00083         /* SPE Group base directory fd */
00084         int             fd_grp_dir;
00085         
00086         /* SPE SPUFS base dir fd*/
00087         int fd_spe_dir;
00088         
00089         /* SPE Program execution and environment flags */
00090         unsigned int    flags;
00091         
00092         /* SPE Mailbox and Signal fds */
00093         int spe_fds_array[NUM_MBOX_FDS];
00094         int spe_fds_refcount[NUM_MBOX_FDS];
00095         
00096         /* SPE MFC Unit fd */
00097         //int   fd_mfc;
00098         
00099         /* event pipes for speevent library */
00100         int ev_pipe[2];
00101         
00102         /* Base Addresses of memory mapped SPE areas */
00103         void    *psmap_mmap_base;
00104         void    *mem_mmap_base;
00105         void    *mfc_mmap_base;
00106         void    *mssync_mmap_base;
00107         void    *cntl_mmap_base;
00108         void    *signal1_mmap_base;
00109         void    *signal2_mmap_base;
00110         
00111         /* Last spu_run return code, for example stop and signal code */
00112         unsigned int    stop_reason;
00113         
00114         /* Last spu_run system call status code */
00115         unsigned int    stop_status;
00116         
00117         /* SPE program entry point generated by elf_load() */
00118         int             entry;
00119 };
